Name: TOAM – Trajectory of a Memory Trace. Human episodic memory 7T fMRI dataset
Acknowledgements: The authors thank Mirco Bristle and Luzius Brogli for their support during data analysis. Calculations were performed on UBELIX (https://www.id.unibe.ch/hpc), the HPC cluster at the University of Bern.
HowToAcknowledge: This will be replaced by publication details once published.
Funding: This work was supported by Sitem-Insel Support Funds SISF 2019 to K. Henke and by the SNFS Advanced Grant TMAG-1_209374 to K. Henke.
EthicsApprovals: The study was approved by the ethics committee of the Canton of Berne (ID: 50008).
